resolution.summary: Implemented trace-generating testbench and format specification for golden model comparison. Created tb_trace.vhd that captures MW events on rising_edge when mem_en=1 and mem_w=1, filtering MAC peripheral writes. Updated Makefile with trace_% pattern rule. All 3 traces verified correct (test_basic: 23 MW, test_branch: 4 MW, test_hazard: 6 MW). RF/SR register dump deferred due to GHDL VHDL-2008 external name NULL access bugs.
